name: Keep me on your Memory Card
description:
A small trip to childhood, where my memories lead me to wake up, feel the smell of toast, find a chocolate on the table and run to the neighboring house, where my cousins lived, who luckily were the same age as me.
We get together every morning to play, our golden childhood was not only based on going out the door to play, but also staying for hours and hours playing PS1. Resident Evil, Tomb Raider, Silent Hill, Metal Slug, Crash, and others are games that sparked my passion for video games, a passion that continues to this day.
I never had a PS1 at home, I always dreamed of writing my name on a memory card and being able to play whenever I want. And today, 18 years later, every time I think about those days when playing was the only thing that mattered, it brings me a beautiful nostalgia, so I allow myself to go back in time for just a little while, and give myself the treat I always wanted as a child, write my name on the memory card.
